definition: Huangping county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: In comparison, Huangping County’s policy of roadside salutes is arguably benign.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，黃平縣的路上敬禮並不那麼惡劣。
